TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在将 控件添加到页面之前。The event occurs before a control is added to a page. 在许多常见情况下，可以将控件添加到页面中。There are a number of common scenarios where a control can be added to a page. 有关这些内容的完整说明，请参阅方法的 "备注" 部分 。For a full description of these, see the Remarks section for the method. 类提供对要添加到页面的 Web 部件控件的属性的访问。The class provides access to properties about the Web Parts control being added to the page. 添加控件时，必须对其进行检查，以确定是否已 设置控件的属性，如果是，是否已授权控件添加到页中。When a control is added, it must be checked to see whether its property has been set and, if so, whether the control is authorized to be added to the page.

MemberSignature.Value: public WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs (Type type, string path, string authorizationFilter, bool isShared);

span.span: The relative application path to the source file for the control being authorized, if the control is a user control.

span.span: An arbitrary string value assigned to the property of a control, used for authorizing whether a control can be added to a page.

param.name: isShared
param.span: 指示被检查授权情况的控件是否为共享控件，共享意味着它对应用程序的许多用户或所有用户可见，并且其 属性值设为 。

span.span: Indicates whether the control being checked for authorization is a shared control, meaning that it is visible to many or all users of the application, and its property value is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 共享 Web 部件控件对网页的所有用户均可见。A shared Web Parts control is visible to all users of a Web page. 与共享控件相反，共享控件是特定于用户的控件，仅对向页面添加该控件的用户可见。The opposite of a shared control is a per-user control, which is user-specific and is visible only to the user who added that control to the page. 如果某个动态控件是用户在共享个性化设置范围内查看该页时添加的，则该控件将是共享的。If a dynamic control is added while a user is viewing the page in shared personalization scope, the control will be shared. 如果在用户处于用户个性化设置范围内时添加了控件，则 该控件的属性值将为 `false` 。If the control is added while the user is in user personalization scope, the property value for that control will be `false`. 有关共享控件和每用户控件的详细信息，请参阅 [Web 部件个性化概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information about shared and per-user controls, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)).
